thread.section_title: Hotel Beauchamps - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: LOVED IT!
thread.title_full: LOVED IT! - Review of Hotel Beauchamps, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: txs2017
title: LOVED IT!
text: Great hotel! The service and the room was great! Cleaned everyday we were there! We booked the superior suite which was more than big enough for the two of us! Super close to the subway station (the main mode of transportation we used), as well as the rest of amusements on Champs-Élysées. Great hotel to stay at for a stay in Paris!
